title: Adarittu aNaiyumayyA
sahitya:
Adarittu aNaiyumayyA Arumukha nAthanE ennai nI


anupallavi

  pAda kamalam unadai paNindu vandiDum pEdaiyEnaip-pAdukAttu tIdu Edum urAdu


caraNam    bhUtala vAzhvenadil shOdanaiyAl uLLam vEdanaiyil vADiDum pOdellAm parivODu
nI dayai purindu un nigharillAt-tuNai tanai Edum tayakkamillAdu IndaruL kUrndu
